short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect instances of cyberbullying in texts using ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyberfy empowers users to identify instances of cyberbullying with just a click. Using the advanced AI capabilities of OpenAI's GPT-3.5, this Chrome extension analyzes user-inputted text to detect potential cyberbullying, offering a quick, efficient, and user-friendly way to ensure safer online interactions. Whether you're browsing social media, forums, or any website, Cyberfy stands guard, enhancing your digital well-being by promoting a more respectful and positive online environment. Users must have an OpenAI API key to provide when scanning text.
